group_1.textRight: Wow... I got it!
Amazing, Rena!@It only took me three plays to get it!

group_1.textLeft: Of course you did!@Did you think I'm an idiot?!

group_1.textRight: ...You know, you give surprisingly good advice.

group_1.textLeft: You're finally starting to see what I'm capable of,@huh?

group_1.textRight: Well, I gotta head home for the day.

group_1.textLeft: ...What?@Don't leave!

group_1.textRight: Look, I'm a busy girl...

group_1.textLeft: I mean...@We haven't settled this yet!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, yeah. Another time.
You two sure do hit it off, huh?
Hahaha!
Well, my name's Momoko Togame.@You are?

group_1.textLeft: Oh?
...[wait:1.2][chara:304401:cheek_0][chara:304401:motion_300][chara:304401:lipSynch_1].Ranka.@Ranka Chizu...

group_1.textRight: Ranka, is it?@Nice to meetcha!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:304401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
(This girl...@If I look closely...she's wearing a ring...?!)

group_1.textRight: I'm Kaede Akino~!
Come on, Rena, introduce yourself too, okay?

group_1.textLeft: Urgh...@[chara:100901:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100901:lipSynch_1]...R-Rena Minami's the name...
...N-nice... nice...

group_1.textRight: Nice?

group_1.textLeft: ...Nice luck you've got there!@Lucky you, to have met me!

group_1.textRight: UNlucky, more like.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100901:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]YOUUU little...!

group_1.textRight: (These two also have rings...)
Huh...?
Ranka, could it be that you're a Magical Girl?

group_1.textLeft: (...Shit, I got noticed.)
Ahh, yeah...@That's right, but...you guys are too?

group_1.textRight: Yep.@All three of us are Magical Girls.
Oh... I didn't notice that at all...

group_1.textLeft: I-I noticed it already!

group_1.textRight: But Ranka, were you there the other day at the@Magical Girl gathering?
I don't remember seeing you around...

group_1.textLeft: (...Guess I'll just make up something as I go along...)
Ah, well, I became a Magical Girl in my hometown.
I've only recently moved to Kamihama,@so I don't know much about the area.

group_1.textRight: Oh, right.
In that case, if you ever run into trouble,@you can ask us anything.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, yeah, Momoko's a meddlesome soul.@She'll help you with anything you ask.

group_1.textRight: I'm meddlesome, sure, but don't try to use me@for your own good...

group_1.textLeft: Mm-hmm!

group_1.textRight: Anyway, feel free to talk to us anytime.

group_1.textLeft: (...Heh, here comes my chance.)
(About Kamihama...@About the Automatic Purification System...)
(Oh yes, do tell me ALL about it...)
To be honest, I was so damn nervous because@there's much I don't understand.
So, let's keep in touch, shall we?

group_1.textRight: Mhm!@I'd love to~!

group_1.textLeft: I'll offer you advice, but in return, you've got to@play me in DDR again.
Next time...no handicaps!

group_1.textRight: Heh... Sure.@Watch me beat you by a double score.

group_1.textCenter: Don't you get it yet?@You can't defeat me.
